EmailTemplate.subject: App-Aware, Full-Stack Optimization with Cisco & Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
What if you could ensure infrastructure is never the cause of application performance problems? Cisco and Turbonomic have partnered to help. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>
Join ourÂ live webinar on Wednesday, June 27th at 11 am ET to learn about application-awareness, cloud elasticity on-premises, and supercluster optimization.
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
